messages.title: Straight talking. Vote UKIP
messages.content: SEND THE POLITICIANS A MESSAGE... VOTE UKIP

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
Promises to fight to get a few things back: post offices, weekly refuse collections, good roads, immigration controls, British jobs for British workers, our troops, our Country.
The environmental damage caused by mass immigration to the UK is manifesting itself in vast housing projects in the Witham area; states we cannot house the world in Essex.

issues.environment: The environmental damage caused by mass immigration to the UK is manifesting itself in vast housing projects in the Witham area; says we cannot house the world in Essex.

housing.content: The environmental damage caused by mass immigration to the UK is manifesting itself in vast housing projects in the Witham area; says we cannot house the world in Essex.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born in Essex and self-employed, I built my own house in White Notley and have lived there for 23 years. I was a Parish Councillor for ten years and served with the Parachute Regiment Territorial. I am standing as your UKIP candidate to oppose dubious wars and corrupt politicians, to serve the people of Witham. It's time to put honest local people into Parliament. Many MPs seem to have no love for our country, our history or our culture. Myself? Well in my own way, I am proud to be English and proud of Essex.
